name: Sweet Home Puzzle
description:
Absolute fan or simple puzzle enthusiast? Sweet Home Puzzle will satisfy you!

Enjoy 9 difficulty levels from easy to very difficult, to suit your level of play without falling into monotony thanks to the many variations of parts.

Choose your puzzle from more than 100 images, set your own shortcuts, choose your music and play relaxed like at home.

For the curious, each puzzle, from natural landscapes to works of art, comes with a description, so your puzzles will hold no secrets for you.

Features :



  • Already 100 unique images
  • 9 difficulty levels for each puzzle: from 24 to 1600 parts
  • Many variations of pieces by level of difficulty that will allow you to vary the pleasures
  • Drag&Drop and « double click » (click to select, move, click to drop) to move your parts
  • Automatic backup and Steam Cloud: don't lose any of your progress and find your backups on all your computers
  • Up to 15 sorting screens allowing you to form groups of parts by colors or shapes
  • Choose your relaxing soundtrack: jazz piano or handpan

And more :


Content listed below is not in game yet, but already planned.

  • « Puzzle of the week » : one new puzzle each week !
  • Steam Achievements
  • MacOS and Linux support
  • Even more performance optimization
